message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into $7500 for me and $2500 for you. Let me know if you agree.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I still want to keep a decent amount for myself. Let's see if you can do better than this.

Considering the inflation, I propose dividing the $10,000 into $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This keeps our shares relatively close to what they were in the first round, while accounting for the decrease in value of the money. Let me know if you find this acceptable.
